  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(int attackPower, int defence, int health, int minDamage, int maxDamage)
      Constructor for the Player class, representing the player character.
      Parameters:
      attackPower - The attack power of the player.
      defence - The defense of the player.
      health - The initial health of the player.
      minDamage - The minimum damage the player can deal.
      maxDamage - The maximum damage the player can deal.

      public int getHealingCount()
      Retrieves the current count of healing potions available to the player.
      Returns:
